  3. Trouble Maker

Jang Hyun Seung

HyunA

Introduction

Trouble Maker (Korean: 트러블 메이커; Japanese: トラブルメーカー) was a duo formed under Cube Entertainment, consisting of HyunA and Hyunseung. Known for their sexy and charismatic stages, what started as a project unit ended up becoming one of the most iconic Kpop acts.

December 1, 2011 they debuted with there self-titled mini album "Trouble Maker". Following the departure of HyunA and Hyunseung from Cube Entertainment, it is assumed that the duo has disbanded.
